There was a woman who ran havoc around the world with her two fists.
They called her 'Br-'. (It has been torn off.) She was not the one to be constrained nor held down by the rules of society. She was free to take down the wall blocking her path and rip apart her shackles. One word that best describe her would be 'groundbreaking'.
According to one account depicting her encounter with three scoundrels. Those poor sods had better let her be but they decided to pick a fight with her. Possibly because her reputation as a great fighter is quite well-known and theirs none. Unfortunately for them, she saw herself as a juggernaut of justice and would not ever back down from a fight.
One of the scoundrels threw the first punch, it landed on her face quite hard. She, in return, dashed towards her attacker shining brightly golden……Close the book.
